pages.text: Joy of Painting introduces the art of painting to Minecraft! $(br2)Create beautiful canvases, express yourself, and decorate your world with your unique artworks.
Start by crafting a Canvas and an Easel. $(br2)Collect dyes from various flowers and plants to make Paint, then unleash your creativity with brushes, palettes, and stencils.
Hang your paintings on walls, gift them to friends, or sell them for emeralds. $(br2)With Joy of Painting, you'll bring a new layer of artistic expression to Minecraft!
